catalog_info.title: Advanced Modern Hebrew II
catalog_info.notes: Conducted in Hebrew. Not open to auditors. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 4043.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Modern Hebrew 130a, or equivalent level of proficiency.
catalog_info.description: This course is a continuation of Hebrew 130a. Texts, films, and other materials expose students to the richness and complexity of the contemporary sociolinguistics of Israeli society.
